pre_caption: This is a static, computer-animated scenery shot of a luxurious high-rise apartment balcony. The scene overlooks a sprawling cityscape with prominent skyscrapers during what appears to be sunset. The balcony is sparsely furnished with two modern armchairs and a small table, emphasizing the view.
